010package imagingbook.common.color.iterate;
011
012import java.awt.Color;
013import java.util.Random;
014
015/**
016 * Instances of this class create a sequence of random colors.
017 * 
018 * @author WB
019 * @version 2022/11/06
020 *
021 */
022public class RandomHueGenerator implements ColorSequencer {
023//      TODO: Improve randomness (currently not too good, much red ...), modify saturation?.
024        private float h = 0.0f;         // hue (changing)
025        private float s = 0.9f;         // saturation (fixed)
026        private float b = 0.9f;         // brightness (fixed)
027        private final Random rnd; 
028
029        /**
030         * Constructor (no random seed).
031         */
032        public RandomHueGenerator() {
033                this(0);
034        }
035        
036        /**
037         * Constructor with specific random seed (for repeatability).
038         * @param seed random seed 
039         */
040        public RandomHueGenerator(long seed) {
041                this.rnd = (seed == 0) ? new Random() : new Random(seed);
042        }
043        
044        public void setSaturation(double s) {
045                if (s < 0) s = 0;
046                if (s > 1) s = 1;
047                this.s = (float) s;
048        }
049        
050        public void setBrightness(double b) {
051                if (b < 0) b = 0;
052                if (b > 1) b = 1;
053                this.b = (float) b;
054        }
055        
056        /**
057         * Returns the next random color.
058         */
059        @Override
060        public Color next() {
061                //h = (h + 0.8f + 0.3f * (float)rnd.nextGaussian()) % 1.0f;
062                //h = (float) (h + rnd.nextGaussian()) % 1.0f;
063                h = (h + 0.1f + 0.8f * rnd.nextFloat()) % 1.0f;
064                return Color.getHSBColor(h, s, b); 
065        }
066
067}
